price: И кад се ослободе Гог и Магог и кад се буду низ све стрмине журно спуштали,
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فُتِحَتۡ يَأۡجُوجُ وَمَأۡجُوجُ وَهُم مِّن كُلِّ حَدَبٖ يَنسِلُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā futiḥat yajūju wamajūju wahum min kulli ḥadabin yansilūna
